title: Eclipse Catastrophe - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/18/17
itunes:title: Eclipse Catastrophe - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/18/17
description:
George Noory and astrologer Mark Lerner discuss his fears for major disruptions and danger during the upcoming solar eclipse on August 21, 2017.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
